about.title: Secrets and Schemes in the Gilded Cage
about.paragraph: In the world of high society, <mark>Cold Marriage</mark> delves into the unraveling of your arranged marriage to Helena, a successful yet aloof woman. Living in a lavish penthouse, your relationship is marked by emotional distance and mounting frustration. Helena’s old friend, Sophia, who once was her closest confidante and shared many intimate moments, now harbors a secret crush on you. As Helena prepares for a prestigious charity gala, Sophia’s jealousy drives her to subtly sabotage your marriage with cunning schemes. With the loyal maid Liliane observing the drama unfold, you must navigate a web of deceit to uncover the truth behind Helena’s cold demeanor and Sophia’s treacherous designs, all while grappling with the future of your fractured relationship.

dialogues.title: Special Event
dialogues.subtitle: Secrets and Schemes in the Gilded Cage
dialogues.dialogue: You enter the living room, exhausted. The wife scrutinizes a guest list while Sophia lounges on the sofa, her eyes following you with a glimmer of interest.
"Oh, you’re finally home."
<strong>She glances up with a cool, detached expression.
"I was beginning to think you’d decided to stay at the office all night."
"Sophia, I was just telling him about the gala. Do you remember how you were complaining about the guest list earlier?"
<strong>She hands the list to Sophia with a dismissive wave.
"Would you mind giving it another look? Perhaps you can spot any discrepancies that I missed."
<strong>Now she turns and addresses you
“And please, try to remember that we are hosting one of the most important charity events of the season. I expect you to act accordingly. No more of your... casual behavior.”
<strong>Her eyes narrow slightly and her tone sharpens, reflecting her frustration as she looks at you.
"No mistakes tonight."
"You know him, I’m sure you’ll be just fine. You always manage to surprise us, don’t you?"
<strong>She flashes a practiced, sweet smile yet with a hint of something secret.
"But do try to impress. We wouldn’t want to see you embarrass yourself."
"I’ve arranged for a stylist to come by later to help with your suit. I don’t trust you to handle such details on your own."
<strong>Her voice is laced with condescension.
"And you’ll need to be on your best behavior."
<strong>Liliane approaches you with a polite, professional smile.
"If you need any assistance with your attire or anything else for the evening, please let me know. I’ll be around to help."
"I’m sure you’ll be perfect tonight. Just remember, if you need any advice or... support, I’m always here."
<strong>She gives you a lingering, almost affectionate smile.
The tense and intriguing environment surrounds you <strong>Continue the story below...
